Naruto enters Six Paths Sage Mode and throws a Tailed Beast Ball Rasenshuriken at the opponent, following with three shadow clones throwing lava, blue fire and magnet Rasenshuriken at them, leaving hazardous pools from the elemental Rasenshuriken.
